name: lion-and-mouse-demo
description: Demo of broccoli-lion-and-mouse, an absurd little BroccoliJS filter. Builds result in two subfolders, 'LION' and 'mouse', each containing a full copy of the source directory, but with all .txt files converted to ALL UPPERCASE and all lowercase, respectively. Run me: `rm -rf dist; broccoli build dist`
author: Alan Hogan
